item.description:
It's Brunch time!

 

Take a break from your holiday shopping and join some friends for a great brunch.

 

Some of the brunch items include: Grand Marnier French Toast, Eggs Benedict, Breakfast Sandwiches and lunch items that include Baked Haddock, Steak Tips, Meatloaf, Chicken Cutlets and much more!

 

Cost for brunch: $14.95 (they also have a great assortment of a la carte items)  Llink to their brunch menu:   http://events.blackswancountryclub.com/downloads/breakfast_menu.pdf

 

This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (Our Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) so there may be more people going to this event then you see.  IF you are on both sites please only RSVP on 1 site.  If you end up putting in your yes on both sites be looking for an email from me, explaining which group I took you off of which will be my choice.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside sitting in the waiting area to your right, if you arrive late come in and find us in the dinning room.
item.name: Brunch time
